## Set up

```{r, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
MData <- read.csv("measurements.csv")
```

## dplyr and regex

```{r}
MData <- MData %>%
  mutate(Sp = sub("(\\w)\\w+", "\\1.", Organism))

newData <- MData %>% 
  select(Sp, Limb.width, Limb.length, Observer)

write.csv(newData, "./MeasShort.csv")
```
